lead_paragraph: While Nick Saban wants to see improvement, top-ranked Alabama was pretty impressive in the opening of its national-title defense — without a proven quarterback and with Heisman Trophy-winning tailback Derrick Henry in the NFL.

headline.print_headline: No. 1 Alabama Rolls With Freshman QB to Beat No. 20 USC 52-6
headline.main: No. 1 Alabama Rolls With Freshman QB to Beat No. 20 USC 52-6

snippet: While Nick Saban wants to see improvement, top-ranked Alabama was pretty impressive in the opening of its national-title defense — without a proven quarterback and with Heisman Trophy-winning tailback Derrick Henry in the NFL....
